attributes.action: The People Demand to Dissolve Parliament for a General Election to be held
attributes.additional_details: 25 days after a successful Motion to Dissolve Parliament a General Election must be held.
attributes.background: Our current Parliament is paralysed by opposing opinions regarding Brexit preventing new legislation from being debated. In order for the UK to move on, a General Election must be held so that the People can Vote for a new Government and end the uncertainty.
